Row.Text: Capital receives +100% boost to all yields.
All land units gain +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.
Feline unique Ancient era unit that replaces the Scout. Has a higher sight range and ignores [ICON_Movement] Movement penalties for Woods and Rainforests.
A building unique to the Felines. Provides +4 [ICON_Culture] Culture.

A building unique to the Felines. Provides +4 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +2 Loyalty per turn in this city. If the city already has maximum Loyalty, also provides an additional +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture.
